name: mini octopus
sizes_available: width 8 x length 6 cm/ 3.1 x 2.3 inches.
notes:
looking for a cute crochet amigurumi that works up fast? check the no sew mini octopus pattern. easy and fun crochet amigurumi octopus even beginners can make.

even better! this pattern is no sew. not even a single part to attach.
**** this is not a finished toy ****
this pattern requires no sewing. 100% no sew.

this pattern includes:
* step-by-step written instructions and photo tutorials for a mini crochet octopus.

materials:
* plush yarn, tapestry needle, safety eyes, fyberfill for stuffing, crochet hook
* you can use any weight of yarn for this project.

difficulty: advanced beginner.

skills required: crocheting in spiral, magic ring, chain, slip stitch, single crochet stitch, increasing and decreasing.

if you have any questions contact us via private message!
